Roosevelt de Paula Almado

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/5498981796005201
  • Última atualização do currículo em 29/09/2015

Forest Engineer, Master of Forest Entomology, specialization in Environmental Education, specialization Environmental Management, specialization in health and safety enginnering. 20 years experience in the areas of Forest Research, Environment, forestry and forest management, having gained solid experience in certification programs such as FSC , ISO 14001, ISO 18001, Guidelines For Management; SAP/R3 and other system management software. International experience as a member of technical staff who participated in the Brazilian trip to the Conference of the IUFRO - International Union Forestry Researchers Organization in August 2005 in Brisbane, Australia. In November 2005 as a speaker at a Conference on the Environment Group Arcelor held in Luxembourg on the theme "TRENDS IN ENVIRONMENTAL LEGISLATION IN SOUTH AMERICA"; In August 2006, as a guest coach on the north coast of Australia to import genetic material from Eucalyptus for inclusion in the Breeding Program ArcelorMittal Forests; In October 2006, as a lecturer in Internal Workgroup on Biodiversity Group ARCELOR Gijon - Spain, in July 2007 along with the thematic program of Forestry and Management - IPEF - USP, as a member of the technical trip to the southeastern United States to meet the silvicultural practices and research related to breeding, ecophysiology, tower flow techniques, soil preparation and timber harvesting. In May and June 2010 along with the thematic program of Pine Productivity - PPIB - USP, as a member of the technical trip to the southeastern United States to meet the silvicultural practices and research related to breeding, ecophysiology, flux tower, technical Preparation of soil and forest harvesting. Current Vice-Chairman of the Board of SIF - Society of Forest Investigations - Federal University of Viçosa and board member of the IPEF - Institute for Studies and Research Forest - ESALQ / University of Sao Paulo. (Texto informado pelo autor)
